name: s3-lambda-markdown-to-html-s3
description: A Serverless Application Repository Component for converting Markdown files from one S3 bucket, to HTML files and into another S3 bucket.

scripts.package: aws cloudformation package --template-file template.yaml --output-template-file output.yaml --s3-bucket s3-lambda-markdown-to-html-s3-bucket
scripts.deploy: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file output.yaml --stack-name s3-lambda-markdown-to-html-s3 --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM
scripts.qd: npm run package && npm run deploy
scripts.deploy:test: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file output.yaml --stack-name s3-lambda-markdown-to-html-s3 --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --parameter-overrides InputS3Bucket=s3-lambda-convert-pdf-s3-uploadbucket-1fmr9u6446kry OutputS3Bucket=s3-lambda-convert-pdf-s3-resultsbucket-8w72609rpgfc

author: Aleksandar Simovic <alexander.simovic@gmail.com>
